name: UKCoreNHSNumberVerificationStatus
title: UK Core NHS Number Verification Status
description: A set of codes that indicate the trace status of an NHS Number with respect to a national source of NHS Numbers.    Where there is no information about the trace status available, a specific code from the nullFlavor Code System can be used instead to indicate this.

contains.display: Number not present and trace not required
Number present and traced using Welsh NHS AR
Trace attempted - No match or multiple match found
Trace needs to be resolved - (NHS number or patient detail conflict)
Trace postponed (baby under six weeks old)
